main event: Dominick Drago, a beauty-shop operator, reported a sighting of a low-flying saucer-shaped object with a bright blue light while fishing in New Jersey on July 23, 1957.
interesting points: The object was about 125 feet long and 30 feet wide,It hovered with an elevation of 8 degrees and made no noise,The object emitted a bright blue light that illuminated the surroundings,It accelerated at a speed exceeding 1,000 miles per hour before disappearing,Drago was frightened and rowed rapidly to the shore during the sighting.
witness description: Dominick Drago, a beauty-shop operator from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
